    • Constructor Detail

      • BringService

        public BringService(String clientIdentifier)
        Constructor that autodetects available BringConnections (i.e. chooses automatically between UrlConnection, HttpClient 3 and HttpClient 4 depending on what's on the classpath. HttpClient 3 and HttpClient 4 are sub-modules that must be included). If no extra BringConnection sub-modules are loaded, then UrlConnection is used as default.
        Parameters:
        clientIdentifier - Unique string that identifies the caller. Domain of the web site is preferred.

      • BringService

        public BringService(BringConnection bringConnection)
        Constructor that accepts a custom BringConnection implementation.
        Parameters:
        bringConnection - Custom BringConnection

      • BringService

        public BringService(BringConnection bringConnection,
                    BringParser<ShippingGuideResult> shippingGuideParser,
                    BringParser<TrackingResult> trackingParser)
        Constructor that accepts a custom BringConnection and a custom BringParser.
        Parameters:
        bringConnection - Custom BringConnection

    • Method Detail

      • queryShippingGuide

        public ShippingGuideResult queryShippingGuide(Shipment shipment,
                                              QueryType queryType)
                                       throws RequestFailedException
        Queries Bring Fraktguide for products available for passed in Shipment instance.
        Parameters:
        shipment - Parameters for the request
        queryType - Used to limit search (faster requests)
        Returns:
        ShippingGuideResult Product prices, expected delivery, trace messages etc.
        Throws:
        RequestFailedException

      • queryTracking

        public TrackingResult queryTracking(TrackingQuery trackingQuery)
                             throws RequestFailedException
        Queries Bring Tracking for passed in query.
        Parameters:
        trackingQuery - Search parameters (reference-, transmission-, or package number)
        Returns:
        TrackingResult Tracking data
        Throws:
        RequestFailedException

      • queryTracking

        public TrackingResult queryTracking(TrackingQuery trackingQuery,
                                    String apiUserId,
                                    String apiKey)
                             throws RequestFailedException
        Queries Bring Tracking for passed in query using given API userID and key. Returns more info than open (non-logged in) query.
        Parameters:
        trackingQuery - Search parameters (reference-, transmission-, or package number)
        apiUserId - API user identity
        apiKey - API key
        Returns:
        TrackingResult Tracking data for authenticated users
        Throws:
        RequestFailedException

      • getSignatureImageAsStream

        public InputStream getSignatureImageAsStream(Signature recipentSignature)
                                      throws RequestFailedException
        Query for signature image. Caller is responsible for closing stream.
        Parameters:
        recipentSignature - received from queryTracking
        Returns:
        InputStream (used to access signature images)
        Throws:
        RequestFailedException

      • getSignatureImageAsStream

        public InputStream getSignatureImageAsStream(Signature recipentSignature,
                                             String apiUserId,
                                             String apiKey)
                                      throws RequestFailedException
        Query for signature image for passed in query using given API userID and key. The signature must exist to be downloaded. Caller is responsible for closing stream.
        Parameters:
        recipentSignature - received from queryTracking
        Returns:
        InputStream (used to access signature images)
        Throws:
        RequestFailedException
